Package care_api

Detailed Description

Class for access authentication routínes. Extends the class "Core". Note this class should be instantiated only after a "$db" adodb connector object has been established by an adodb instance

Address methods. Note this class should be instantiated only after a "$db" adodb connector object has been established by an adodb instance.

Elpidio Latorilla
Version:
